contentrichtext.text: '''Welwyn Wilton Katz''' (born June 7, 1948) is a [[Canada|Canadian]] [[children's author]] who has lived in [[Kitchener, Ontario|Kitchener]] and [[Toronto, Ontario|Toronto]], Ontario. In 1994 she was awarded the [[Vicky Metcalf Award]]. She currently lives in [[London]]. ==Works== *''[[The Prophecy of Tau Ridoo]]'' - 1982 *''[[Witchery Hill]]'' - 1984 *''[[Sun God, Moon Witch]]'' - 1986 *''[[False Face (novel)|False Face]]'' - 1987 (nominated for a [[1987 Governor General's Awards|Governor General's Award]]) *''[[The Third Magic]]'' - 1988 (winner of the [[1988 Governor General's Awards|1988 Governor General's Award for Children's Literature]]) *''[[Whale Singer]]'' - 1990 (nominated for a [[1990 Governor General's Awards|Governor General's Award]]) *''Come Like Shadows'' - 1993 * ''Time Ghost'' (1995, [[Margaret K. McElderry]]) ISBN 0-689-80027-4 *''[[Out of the Dark (1995 novel)|Out of the Dark]]'' - 1995 (nominated for a [[1995 Governor General's Awards|Governor General's Award]]) which was also used by A & J for Lit Circles in Carnduff Education Complex in Grade 6. It was on the year of 2010.
